item.title: Solo Travel to Rishikesh - Yoga Capital of the World
item.description: Solo travel to Rishikesh, known as the "Yoga Capital of the World," can be a transformative journey offering opportunities for self-discovery, spiritual growth, and adventure. Here's why, how, and when to plan a solo trip to Rishikesh: Why Solo Travel to Rishikesh: Yoga and Meditation: Rishikesh is renowned for its numerous yoga schools, ashrams, and meditation centers, making it
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
